entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assets file ‘C:\*\obj\project.assets.json' doesn't have a target for 'net9.0-ios'. Ensure that restore has run and that you have included 'net9.0-ios' in the TargetFrameworks for your project. #25431
  • Animations are not working in Xiaomi HyperOS (and Oppo ColorOS) #25428
  • ConstraintLayout - DimensionRatio on Android Platform issue #25427
  • .Net 8/ 9 Memory leaks #25425
  • Add check for `Shell` so if users try to push to it or not set it as the root we throw a more helpful exception #25423
    Backlog
  • ListViewRenderer Crash in HostApp #25421
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Unable to customize scrollbar on ListView #25415
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Navigation.PushModalAsync memory leak #25410
  • NRE when setting images on buttons with a null ImageSource on iOS in 8.0.92 #25409
    .NET 8 SR9 8.0.93
  • Bindable property doesn't set properly when it is a member of BindableObject #25407
    Backlog
  • [XC] Properly compile BindingExtension to avoid AOT warnings #25406
  • Update Notification Not Working Properly With Sideloaded Windows App | MAUI #25405

Closed

  • Blazor Hybrid + Web solution template missing project refs in .sln when created via VS Code #22381
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • WebView causes empty window popup and closes immediately #24933
    .NET 9 SR1
  • MAUI Android ListView using ViewCell with cells with borders does not appear to wrap text when Label has LineBreakMode="WordWrap" #25219
  • System.IndexOutOfRangeException: IItemsViewSource is empty #25357
  • TapGestureRecognizer not working on iOS from maui 8.0.80 and onward #25237
  • TitleBar visual state typo #25245
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • RC2 : Maui App failed to build with XamlC error : Object reference not set to an instance of an object. #25309
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [TitleBar] Fix commented out TitleBar style #25248
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Unable to load library libSkiaSharp #25208
  • .NET MAUI Windows app can't start #25372
  • .net9 RC2 - Compiled Bindings - cannot resolve type in StaticResource #25172
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • ios smart quotes replacing normal double quotes when a json file is loaded with the file picker #25168

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx] [Blazor Hybrid] Fire and forget `BlazorWebView` disposal by default #25430
  • Fix for issue 24557 Android OnKeyUp not capturing keypresses #25429
  • Merge NET9 GA into main #25422
  • Add New .NET MAUI Template with Syncfusion Toolkit Integration #25419
    area-templates, community ✨, .NET 9.0 GA
  • CollectionView with EmptyView and EmptyViewTemplate for Data template selector throws an exception #25418
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • TableView title issue fix on iOS and windows platforms. #25414
    community ✨
  • [Android] RefreshView in a grid #25413
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-refreshview
  • [iOS] Use non-overridden traits in AppInfoImplementation.RequestTheme #25412
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-essentials, community ✨
  • [Android] CarouselView: Remove rounding from SizedItemContentView that results in off-by-one pixel error #25411
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [testing] These Semantic tests seem to fail often on MacCatalyst #25408
    area-testing, testing-flakiness, testing-green-ci, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Android]: Preserve the ActivityResultRegistry During MauiAppCompatActivity Creation #25404
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨

Merged

  • Set title on maui-blazor/-app template window #25426
    area-blazor, area-templates
  • Bump Android Dependencies #25424
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [XC] Avoid NativeAOT trim warnings for compiled bindings #25420
    area-xaml, .NET 9.0 GA
  • [gh actions] introduce "inclusive heat sensor" #25389

Updated

  • [iOS] Transparent button border color when border color is not set #25373
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Updates for ASPNET GA branding #25348
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [Android] ClearButtonVisibility with margin fix #25392
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • HybridWebView: Invoke .NET methods from JavaScript #25077
    area-controls-hybridwebview, .NET 9.0 GA
  • Fix for issue 23316 Android AVIF support with Glide #25376
    platform/android 🤖, do-not-merge
  • [ios,tests] Fix iOS Header with Group #25157
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview
  • Add Device logs to Integration Tests #24268
    area-testing, .NET 9 SR1
  • Support for Setting Switch Off State Color #25068
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9.0 GA
  • Propagate any Page.Title to the window, not just for Shell #25338
    area-templates, area-controls-window
  • [Android] Fix for span GestureRecognizers don't work when the span is wrapped over two lines. #25180
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, area-gestures
  • [Android] Fixed CollectionView MeasureFirstItem Rendering issue #25367
    community ✨
  • Entry Height gets updated when loaded inside the RoundRectangle Shape #25166
    area-drawing, community ✨
  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment Does not Works. #25129
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Windows] Fixed TextCell Command executes only once #25066
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fixed Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24999
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [iOS]Fix for Character Spacing Not Updating Correctly in Editor for Dynamically Added Text #25347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Fixed Size not calculated properly when invoking UseMauiCompatibility method in MauiProgram #25003
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, community ✨
  • [Testing] More ignore attributes for UITests #25345
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #2 #25378
    area-testing
  • Moving last Xamarin.UITests to Appium #25366
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #1 #25178
    area-testing
  • [Testing] Implement ContextMenu UITest extension methods #25340
    area-testing
  • [iOS] Fix for Single item alignment issue in CollectionView HorizontalGrid Layout #25370
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Perf : ButtonContentTypeConverter now using InvariantCulture to parse… #25393
    community ✨, area-controls-button, t/perf
  • Remove excessive BoxView API comments #25399
    area-docs, community ✨
  • Add note to PR template about only targeting main #25402
  • Fix for picker on hidden page opens after back navigation in Android #25319
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-picker
